dialogue.introduction: Good morning. I'm Takao. It's great that you look like an excellent Admiral.
dialogue.library_intro: If you're talking about cruisers, no matter how you look at it, it has to be me, Takao! Attached to Vice Admiral Kondo's 4th fleet, I participated in many naval battles. Overcoming these hard-fought conflicts, I concluded with a diligent defence of Singapore.
dialogue.secretary1: Please, you can ask me anything.
dialogue.secretary2: Is there something that you are worried about?
dialogue.secretary3: Um, oh, what should I do?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, Takao will be with you... have no fear.
dialogue.wedding: These words of praise... I would like to have that in a more direct way... no, not a medal, but instead...
dialogue.equipment1: Somehow, to be liberated like this... what a great feeling.
dialogue.equipment2: This power is all thanks to the Admiral.
dialogue.supply: Somehow, to be liberated like this... what a great feeling.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Let's watch over those children from here.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Total recumbence... even though I can still fight...
dialogue.docking_complete: It seems like repairs are complete!
dialogue.ship_construction: A new comrade. Let's give them a warm welcome!
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Operation complete! The fleet has returned!
dialogue.mvp: Admiral, did you watch my performance?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: W-what! Did you think you'd win with that!?
dialogue.sunk: I am... sinking, huh... Good bye... Admiral...
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry ChristmasÂ ! Admiral, only for today forget about you commander's work and let's enjoy a party together. Oh!? Ah, Atago! Please, do not bother us.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Let's get on the Spring Cleaning. Choukai and Maya, please participate too. Atago is... eh? Not here!?
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year! Please look forward to 4th squadron's Takao-class heavy cruisers this year! Now, shall we go to the first shrine visit for the New Year?
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Atago, we are supposed to eat as many beans equal to our age. Hm, you don't want them? Okay... Ah, Myoukou! Uh, you are going to be an Oni... I think you shouldn't... EH~?
